name: Best Ever Cinnamon Pull Aparts
author: Beth
summary: These are the easiest, most incredible cinnamon pull aparts you will ever have. We make them once a year on Christmas morning! You may adjust the amount of cinnamon to suit your taste.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease an 8 inch cake pan
In a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon and a dash of salt
Open the biscuits and cut each biscuit into four pieces; set aside
Put the pieces of biscuit into the mixture, a few at a time, until they are all completely coated
Arrange the biscuit pieces in the pan in layers
Heat the butter in a small saucepan over low heat, stir the remaining sugar mixture and the pecans into the hot butter
Pour the butter mixture over the biscuit pieces
Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes, until top is golden brown
